mutants.code:
def is_reversed_equal(x, y):
    x = ''.join(sorted(str(x)))
    y = ''.join(sorted(str(y)))
    return x != y[::-1]

def is_reversed_equal(x, y):
    x = 'MUTATED'.join(sorted(str(x)))
    y = ''.join(sorted(str(y)))
    return x == y[::-1]

def is_reversed_equal(x, y):
    x = ''.join(sorted(str(x)))
    y = 'MUTATED'.join(sorted(str(y)))
    return x == y[::-1]

def is_reversed_equal(x, y):
    x = ''.join(sorted(str(x)))

    return x == y[::+1]

def is_reversed_equal(x, y):

def is_reversed_equal(x, y):
    x = ''.join(sorted(str(x)))
    y = ''.join(sorted(str(y)))
    return x == y[::--1]
